com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize

Class _UserAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.reorganize._UserAction

  • public final class _UserAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to manage 'User' entities through Drools rules engine

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addDelegatedEntitlement(DAO sql, boolean checkIncompatibility, <any> remediationList, <any> entitlementsToDelegate, UserBean represented, UserBean delegated)
      The method assigns in delegation the given list of entitlements from the user represented given to the user delegated given.
      static void addEntitlements(DAO sql, boolean checkIncomp, <any> remediationList, <any> rightsList, OrgUnitBean orgUnit, <any> entitlements, UserBean userBean)
      The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit.
      static void addEntitlements(DAO sql, boolean defaultEntitlements, boolean checkIncomp, <any> remediationList, <any> rightsList, OrgUnitBean orgUnit, <any> entitlements, UserBean userBean)
      Deprecated. 
      Replaced by #addEntitlements(DAO, boolean, boolean, OrgUnitBean, BeanList, UserBean)

      The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit. If the user doesn't belong to any organization unit, it can be passed the organization unit to associate to the user. However if the user already belongs to an organization unit, it is important that the organization unit passed corresponds to the organization unit of the user. The defaultEntitlements flag specifies whether the method must also to associate default entitlements of the organization unit or not. The checkIncomp flag specifies whether the method must to check the incompatibility of the entitlements, with those the user already has, or not. In case of incompatibility, it throws an exception. It is also possible to associate a list of remediation to correct an unmanaged Sod situation and a list of valorized entitlement rights to associate to the user.

      static void addEntitlements(DAO sql, boolean defaultEntitlements, boolean checkIncomp, OrgUnitBean orgUnit, <any> entitlements, UserBean userBean)
      The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit.

      • addEntitlements

        public static void addEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                   boolean defaultEntitlements,
                                   boolean checkIncomp,
                                   OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                   <any> entitlements,
                                   UserBean userBean)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit. If the user doesn't belong to any organization unit, it can be passed the organization unit to associate to the user. However if the user already belongs to an organization unit, it is important that the organization unit passed corresponds to the organization unit of the user. The defaultEntitlements flag specifies whether the method must also to associate default entitlements of the organization unit or not. In case of incompatibility, it throws an exception. The checkIncomp flag specifies whether the method must to check the incompatibility of the entitlements, with those the user already has, or not.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        defaultEntitlements - boolean flag to associate also the default entitlements of the organization unit
        checkIncomp - boolean flag to enable the entitlement incompatibility check and to avoid a risk situation
        orgUnit - organization unit of the user, recommended
        entitlements - list of entitlements to assign, mandatory
        userBean - user target of the assignment, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlements

        @Deprecated
public static void addEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                               boolean defaultEntitlements,
                                               boolean checkIncomp,
                                               <any> remediationList,
                                               <any> rightsList,
                                               OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                               <any> entitlements,
                                               UserBean userBean)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. Replaced by #addEntitlements(DAO, boolean, boolean, OrgUnitBean, BeanList, UserBean)

        The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit. If the user doesn't belong to any organization unit, it can be passed the organization unit to associate to the user. However if the user already belongs to an organization unit, it is important that the organization unit passed corresponds to the organization unit of the user. The defaultEntitlements flag specifies whether the method must also to associate default entitlements of the organization unit or not. The checkIncomp flag specifies whether the method must to check the incompatibility of the entitlements, with those the user already has, or not. In case of incompatibility, it throws an exception. It is also possible to associate a list of remediation to correct an unmanaged Sod situation and a list of valorized entitlement rights to associate to the user.

        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        defaultEntitlements - boolean flag to associate also the default entitlements of the organization unit
        checkIncomp - boolean flag to enable the entitlement incompatibility and to avoid a risk situation
        remediationList - list of remediation to assign
        rightsList - list of rights to assign
        orgUnit - organization unit of the user, recommended
        entitlements - list of entitlements to assign, mandatory
        userBean - user target of the assignment, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addEntitlements

        public static void addEntitlements(DAO sql,
                                   boolean checkIncomp,
                                   <any> remediationList,
                                   <any> rightsList,
                                   OrgUnitBean orgUnit,
                                   <any> entitlements,
                                   UserBean userBean)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        The method adds a given list of entitlements to the user given that must belong to an organization unit. If the user doesn't belong to any organization unit, it can be passed the organization unit to associate to the user. However if the user already belongs to an organization unit, it is important that the organization unit passed corresponds to the organization unit of the user. The defaultEntitlements flag specifies whether the method must also to associate default entitlements of the organization unit or not. The checkIncomp flag specifies whether the method must to check the incompatibility of the entitlements, with those the user already has, or not. In case of incompatibility, it throws an exception. It is also possible to associate a list of remediation to correct an unmanaged Sod situation and a list of valorized entitlement rights to associate to the user.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        checkIncomp - boolean flag to enable the entitlement incompatibility and to avoid a risk situation

        rightsList - list of rights to assign

                            UserBean user,
                            GroupBean groupBean,
                            java.util.List<EntitlementBean> roles,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,AccountBean> accountList,
                            boolean checkIncomp,
                            boolean defaultRights)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method assigns one or more roles to a user with the possibility to choose an account for each account configuration related to the assignment
        Parameters:
        sql - Connection to DB
        user - The user to whom you want to assign roles
        groupBean - The user's organization unit
        roles - The roles that you want to assign to user
        accountList - Map with account configuration id as key and related accountBean as value
        checkIncomp - Incompatibility check
        defaultRights - boolean that allows to choose if assign the default rights or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exception returned while assigning roles

      • moveUser

        public static void moveUser(DAO sql,
                            OrgUnitBean newOrgUnit,
                            UserBean userBean)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        The method moves the user given from its original organization unit to the new organization unit given. All the entitlements that are compatible with the new organization unit will remain assigned to the user.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        newOrgUnit - new organization unit of the user, mandatory
        userBean - user to move, mandatory

        java.lang.Exception

      • moveOU

        public static void moveOU(DAO sql,
                          int type,
                          OrgUnitBean orgUnitTO,
                          UserBean userBean)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method moves the user given from its original organization unit to the new organization unit given. It is present a parameter that defines the type of movement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        type - integer parameter used to define the type of movement: 1-assigns only the entitlements compatible with the new organization unit 2-assigns only the entitlements of the default employments of the new organization unit
        orgUnitTO - new organization unit of the user, mandatory
        userBean - user to move, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • moveOU

        public static void moveOU(DAO sql,
                          int type,
                          OrgUnitBean orgUnitFrom,
                          OrgUnitBean orgUnitTO,
                          <any> userBeanList)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        The method moves the given list of users from the given organization unit to the new organization unit given. If the list of users is null or empty, all the users belonging to the orgUnitFrom organization unit will be moved under the new organization unit. It is present a parameter that defines the type of movement.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        type - integer parameter used to define the type of movement: 1-assigns only the entitlements compatible with the new organization unit 2-assigns only the entitlements of the default employments of the new organization unit
        orgUnitFrom - original organization unit of the user, mandatory
        orgUnitTO - new organization unit of the user, mandatory
        userBeanList - list of users to move, if null or empty: all users belonging to the orgUnitFrom organization unit will be moved under the new organization unit
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                              Paging paging)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the users that have one or more permissions in delegation from the represented user given. It is possible to filter by permission and user delegated.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        permission - permission filter
        delegated - user delegated filter
        represented - user represented, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of users delegated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • addDelegatedEntitlement

        public static void addDelegatedEntitlement(DAO sql,
                                           boolean checkIncompatibility,
                                           <any> remediationList,
                                           <any> entitlementsToDelegate,
                                           UserBean represented,
                                           UserBean delegated)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        The method assigns in delegation the given list of entitlements from the user represented given to the user delegated given. The checkIncompatibility flag specifies whether the method must to check the incompatibility of the entitlements, with those the user delegated already has, or not. In case of incompatibility, it throws an exception. It is also possible to associate a list of remediation to correct a Sod situation.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        checkIncompatibility - boolean flag to enable the entitlement incompatibility check and to avoid a risk situation
        remediationList - list of remediations to add to the user delegated
        entitlementsToDelegate - list of entitlements to delegate, mandatory
        represented - user represented, mandatory
        delegated - user delegated, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeDelegatedEntitlement

        public static void removeDelegatedEntitlement(DAO sql,
                                              <any> entitlementsToRemove,
                                              UserBean represented,
                                              UserBean delegated)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        The method removes from the user delegated the given list of entitlements given by the user represented.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        entitlementsToRemove - list of entitlements to remove from delegation, mandatory
        represented - user represented, mandatory
        delegated - user delegated, mandatory
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findResource

        public static BeanList findResource(DAO sql,
                                    int type,
                                    boolean grouped,
                                    AbstractBean resBean,
                                    <any> blEntitlementBean,
                                    UserBean userBean,
                                    Paging paging)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the resources according to the parameters chosen. The type of Beanlist returned (and the type of AbstractBean passed) is depending by the value of the type of search chosen: 1-ResourceBean. 2-ResourceBean. 3-OrgUnitBean. 4-EntitlementBean. 5-ApplicationBean. 6-ResourceTypeBean. 7-ResourceFamilyBean. 8-TaskBean. 9-GroupScopeHierBean. 10-RiskBean.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        type - type of search, supported values(1 to 10): 1-resources of the organization unit which the user belongs 2-resources punctually assigned to the user 3-resources of type organization unit 4-resources of type entitlement 5-resources of type application 6-resources of type resourceType 7-resources of type resourceFamily 8-resources of type activity 9-resources of type attribute hierarchy 10-resources of type risk
        grouped - boolean flag to enable the grouping of the internal resources of type organization unit
        resBean - resource parameter filter,it can be used different types of Bean depending by the type of search chosen
        blEntitlementBean - users' entitlements filter, mandatory
        userBean - user filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of resources found, the type of Beanlist is depending by the type of search chosen
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findResources

        public static BeanList findResources(DAO sql,
                                     int type,
                                     boolean grouped,
                                     AbstractBean resBean,
                                     EntitlementBean entBean,
                                     UserBean userBean,
                                     Paging paging)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a Beanlist containing the resources according to the parameters chosen. The type of Beanlist returned (and the type of AbstractBean passed) is depending by the value of the type of search chosen: 1-ResourceBean. 2-ResourceBean. 3-OrgUnitBean. 4-EntitlementBean. 5-ApplicationBean. 6-ResourceTypeBean. 7-ResourceFamilyBean. 8-TaskBean. 9-GroupScopeHierBean. 10-RiskBean.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        type - type of search, supported values(1 to 10): 1-resources of the organization unit which the user belongs 2-resources punctually assigned to the user 3-resources of type organization unit 4-resources of type entitlement 5-resources of type application 6-resources of type resourceType 7-resources of type resourceFamily 8-resources of type activity 9-resources of type attribute hierarchy 10-resources of type risk
        grouped - boolean flag to enable the grouping of the internal resources of type organization unit
        resBean - resource parameter filter,it can be used different types of Bean depending by the type of search chosen
        entBean - user's entitlement filter, mandatory
        userBean - user filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        list of resources found, the type of Beanlist is depending by the type of search chosen
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • findRiskRemediation

        public static java.util.HashMap<RiskBean,<any>> findRiskRemediation(DAO sql,
                                                                    <any> riskList,
                                                                    EnvironmentBean envBean,
                                                                    UserBean userBean,
                                                                    Paging paging)
                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a map with risks of the user given as keyset and beanlists of remediations that heal the risk of the corresponding key as valueset. The environment and user are two fundamental and mandatory parameters.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connection parameter
        riskList - list of risks of the user
        envBean - environment filter, mandatory
        userBean - user filter, mandatory
        paging -
        Returns:
        hasmap of risk-list of remediations
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
